descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 30 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
**🇫🇷 Boule Petanque VR**

The popular VR sports game brings petanque, boules or boccia directly into your living room - whatever the weather. Experience relaxed matches on sun-drenched courts in the south of France or now for the first time: 

Directly on the Champs-de-Mars in Paris - with a view of the Eiffel Tower and passing ships on the Seine.

[media]

**🇫🇷 Games with friends or worldwide**

Start exciting 1v1, 2v2 or 3v3 matches. Create private matches with an individual room code, for example your first name. Perfect for quickly starting a game with friends!
The new spectator mode allows you to watch matches and join in later - no one is left out anymore.

**🇫🇷 New features & upgrades**

🎯 More detailed graphics especially for Meta Quest 3

🎯 Integration of the new meta avatars for more individuality

🎯 Two game environments to choose from: Saint-Paul-de-Vence & Paris Eiffel Tower

You will be accompanied by typical sounds: cicadas, clacking balls and the flair of a French summer's day.

[media]

**🇫🇷 Join us, become part of our community on the Discord server**

Arrange to play, exchange ideas with others and take part in our regular tournaments. Join now: 
https://discord.gg/NrnNMh2JNP


**🇫🇷 Don't have the game yet? Buy it now and get started**.



**Imprint**

Georg Wolf - Chief Developer

Frank Schönhofer - Former lead developer

Kai Kramhöft - Producer
